summary: TL* THE CONTACT OWNS A TEGOL OUTLAW MOTORCYCLE HELMET, MODEL: V5/05/V5/50 /FLAT/BLACK/BUTTERFLY. THE CONTACT RECEIVED NOTIFICATION OF NHTSA CAMPAIGN NUMBER: 17E015000 (EQUIPMENT). THE MANUFACTURER WAS CONTACTED AT 866-371-0281 APPROXIMATELY 10 TIMES. THE CONTACT LEFT THE REQUIRED VOICEMAIL FOR A CALL BACK, BUT THERE WAS NO RESPONSE. IN ADDITION, THE CONTACT SENT AN E-MAIL TO TEGOLINC@GMAIL.COM, BUT NO RESPONSE WAS RECEIVED. THE CONTACT FELT THAT A REASONABLE AMOUNT OF TIME HAD PASSED FOR THE RECALL REMEDY. THE CONTACT HAD NOT EXPERIENCED A FAILURE. PARTS DISTRIBUTION DISCONNECT.
